data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Bulawayo do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bulawayo, Zimbabwe
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Bulawayo.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, 0.1% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, let it be said of the 486,067 lost in Bulawayo that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Bulawayo. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Bulawayo
location.people_groups_list: Gujarati, Birwa, Tswa, Doma, Vadoma, Ndau, Shona
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gujarati (30,000), Birwa (116,000), Tswa (3,800), Doma, Vadoma (18,000), Ndau, Shona (1,026,000)
